Plot: 1808. The Napoleonic Army suffers its first defeat at the hands of a single man: a drummer boy who used the Montserrat mountains to echo his drums and send the enemy troops into a panicked ...
Title: Bruc, the Manhunt
Writer: Patxi Amezcua (screenplay), Jordi Gasull (screenplay), José Luis Latasa (collaboration)
Actors: Juan José Ballesta, Vincent Perez, Astrid Bergès-Frisbey, Santi Millán
